job.title: data scientist - Remote
job.description: strongNow Brewing  Data Scientist tobeapartnerbrbrstrongFrom the beginning Starbucks set out to be a different kind of company One that not onlybrbrcelebrated coffee and the rich tradition but that also brought a feeling of connection We are known for developing extraordinary leaders who share this passion and are guided by their service to othersbrbrAs a Starbucks Data Scientist you will build data products uncover customer insights amp communicate discoveries that drive towards better decisions across the Marketing amp Digital domains and develop a strong partnership with stakeholders to enhance understanding of our customersbrbrstronguLeveraging Your Previous Experience We Will Enable You Tobrustrongul liEvaluate amp translate unstructured questions from business teams to data problems and define roadmap for potential data solutionsli liWork independently as well as part of crossfunctional teams to build relevant analytics solutions using quantitative approachesli liDrive adoption of analytics data products amp insights across business teamsli liUtilize systems thinking approach to conceive plan amp build evergreen data productsli liDevelop analytic systems amp predictive models experiment with new data science techniques and visualize data amp craft effective communications to share discoveriesli liEstablish key performance indicators for the business team and promote data driven decision making that allows for effective planning in stakeholder teamsli liEstablish yourself amp the team as subject matter experts in advanced analytics across departmentsli liCollaborate with other data scientists amp business teams across the Marketing amp Digital spaces to drive foundational understanding of the Starbucks digital experienceli brbrulstronguWed Love To Hear From People Withbrustrongul liDemonstrated experience with data munging analysis machine learning techniques amp visualizationli liStrong problem solving skills with ability to influence business teams at different levelsli liWorking knowledge of data systems design amp data technologiesli liKnowledge of statistical methods amp scripting SQL Python or Rli liRetail customer loyalty andor eCommerce experienceli brbrulJoin us and be part of something bigger Apply todaybrbrStarbucks is an equal opportunity employer of all qualified individuals including minorities women veterans amp individuals with disabilities Starbucks will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with all federal state and local ordinancesbrbrQualified applicants with criminal histories will be considered for employment in a manner consistent with all federal state and local ordinances Starbucks Corporation is
